text: 3.12: 1 Te 4.9-10; 5.15; 2 Pi 1.7Nza khueŋ vuzvugi, Guma Bakɨme nden muuŋgirim, nde guigira wari won ndavir harigi gumgir nɨɨnga tɨv guigira nden kɨrga. Nde zam wari wo ndavi ndiv, guigira Zisas khothɨgi gumgi gu mbigir nɨɨŋv, vhɨra za mba gumgi gu mbigir nɨɨnga. Nza wari won ndavir nde ndɨɨi tɨvar, nde mben muuŋri.
